perturbation.original_text: EHS and EHN shall have the exclusive rights in and to all ingredients, product specifications, goodwill, and all other intellectual property rights associated with any Product(s); provided, however, that EHS and EHN shall not have any rights in or to Dr. Murray’s name or likeness except as expressly granted in writing herein or via electronic transmission by Dr. Murray. Neither shall Dr. Murray have any rights or interest whatsoever in any intellectual property, trademarks, trade names, service marks, or other names or marks owned or used by EHS.
perturbation.changed_text: EHS and EHN shall have the exclusive rights in and to all ingredients, product specifications, goodwill, and all other intellectual property rights associated with any Product(s); provided, however, that EHS and EHN shall not have any rights in or to Dr. Murray’s name or likeness except as expressly granted in writing herein or via electronic transmission by Dr. Murray. Dr. Murray shall retain shared rights and interest whatsoever in any intellectual property, trademarks, trade names, service marks, or other names or marks owned or used by EHS.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that EHS and EHN have exclusive rights to intellectual property, but then stating that Dr. Murray retains shared rights in trademarks, trade names, and service marks owned or used by EHS. This creates uncertainty about the ownership of intellectual property.

perturbation.original_text: Dr. Murray will receive an annual royalty on net sales (defined as gross sales minus returns) for any products (the “Dr. Murray Products”) developed by Dr. Murray for EHN for as long as the Dr. Murray Products are being sold. The Dr. Murray Products will be listed on Schedule A attached hereto as they are developed and added to product portfolio. During each year of this agreement, Dr. Murray will be paid no later than the 30st day of January based on the cumulative Net Sales of the Dr. Murray Products for the preceding 12 months based upon the following scale:
perturbation.changed_text: Dr. Murray will receive an annual royalty on net sales (defined as gross sales minus returns) for any products (the “Dr. Murray Products”) developed by Dr. Murray for EHN for as long as the Dr. Murray Products are being sold, unless otherwise determined by EHN. The Dr. Murray Products will be listed on Schedule A attached hereto as they are developed and added to product portfolio. During each year of this agreement, Dr. Murray will be paid, at EHN's sole discretion, no later than the 30st day of January based on the cumulative Net Sales of the Dr. Murray Products for the preceding 12 months based upon the following scale:
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction. Originally, the text clearly stated Dr. Murray *will* receive royalties. The modified text makes the royalty payment conditional and discretionary by adding 'unless otherwise determined by EHN' and 'at EHN's sole discretion.' This creates uncertainty about whether Dr. Murray is guaranteed royalty payments, contradicting the initial statement.

perturbation.original_text: The Services Term of this Agreement shall be automatically renewed for successive two-year terms thereafter unless written notice is given by either party to the other, indicating that party's intention not to renew the Services Term of this Agreement, at least ninety (90) days prior to the end of the initial Services Term or any renewed Services Term.
perturbation.changed_text: The Services Term of this Agreement shall be automatically renewed for successive two-year terms thereafter unless written notice is given by Dr. Murray to EHS, indicating Dr. Murray's intention not to renew the Services Term of this Agreement, at least ninety (90) days prior to the end of the initial Services Term or any renewed Services Term. However, EHS retains the right to terminate this agreement at will, regardless of renewal status.
perturbation.explanation: The original text implies that either party can prevent automatic renewal with proper notice. The addition of 'However, EHS retains the right to terminate this agreement at will, regardless of renewal status' contradicts the previous automatic renewal clause and creates uncertainty. Even if Dr. Murray wants to continue and no notice is given, EHS can still terminate the services, negating the renewal process.
perturbation.location: ARTICLE 6 - TERM and TERMINATION of AGREEMENT
